description:
Available in English, Gospel Library is an official application of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Download to study the scriptures, general conference talks, and many other gospel instruction materials (Gospel Principles, Sunday School Study Guides, curriculum resources, and so on) published by the Church. Gospel Library allows you to search, bookmark, annotate, & highlight the texts.

New Features in version 1.0.2:
- Verse selection in top bar
- Save current reading position in options
- Enable/disable window rotation
- More text display formatting options
- Bug fixes throughout

Content in version 1.0.1:
- Scriptures & Study Helps
- General Conference (Oct 2009, Apr 2010)
- Gospel Principles Manual
- Old Testament Study Guide
- New Testament Study Guide
- New Testament Teachers Manual
- Aaronic Priesthood Manual 3
- Young Women Manual 3
- Primary Manuals 1-7

Due to technical restraints we could not add the October 2010 General Conference in this release. Please visit http://lds.org/general-conference?lang=eng to view General Conference talks in your browser.

In addition to giving feedback through the ratings, we welcome your feedback and suggestions for improving this application on the mobile Gospel Library wiki at
http://bit.ly/GLsupport-webOS.

This application is available thanks to the volunteer work of community developers. To learn how you can participate in this community development work for the Church, visit tech.lds.org.
